sqlMap.insert: insert into tb_books (title, author, publisher, price, description, regdate) values (#title#, #author#, #publisher#, #price#, #description#, now())
sqlMap.select: select id, title, author, publisher, price, description, regdate from tb_books order by id desc

select id, title, author, publisher, price, description, regdate from tb_books where 1=1
and title like concat('%',#title#,'%')
and title like #author#
and title like #publisher#
